body_html:
I am now separating eager runtime to a new cmake file and build pass.

The new eager runtime depends on c_api while eager/c_api depends on the eager runtime

In past the eager/c_api can be built simultaneously with c_api, I have modified the cmakelist and build eager dependency at the last moment of tensorflow projects.

The modified code can be found here

The modified code can be found here
body:
I am now separating eager runtime to a new cmake file and build pass.

The new eager runtime depends on c_api while eager/c_api depends on the eager runtime

In past the eager/c_api can be built simultaneously with c_api, I have modified the cmakelist and build eager dependency at the last moment of tensorflow projects. 

The modified code can be found [here](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/16480)
